articles.description: It seems that even man’s best friend can’t escape the pandemic.Winston the pug, owned by Ben McLean ’22 and his family, tested positive for COVID-19 on April 24, making him the first dog in the U.S. to test positive for the coronavirus.
articles.content:
by Arielle Beak
